component.name: Open Drive (Google Drive Client)
component.summary: Open source GUI client for Google Drive

description.p: ODrive is a free, open-source Electron-based application that allows you to sync and/or backup files to and from Google Drive without needing to open browser tabs or tussle with Terminal-based tools.
One major plus to this tool is that it's simple to set-up and simple to use. There are no extraneous options or settings to master, no controls or integrations to enable.
